Step 1.Planning: Pick up the sponge from the floor

Step 2.Planning: Pick up the vinegar bottle from the floor

Step 3.Planning: Pour the vinegar from the bottle onto the stain on the window

Step 4.Planning: Pick up the watering can from the floor

Step 5.Planning: Fill the watering can with water

Step 6.Planning: Pick up the bucket from the floor

Step 7.Planning: Pour the water from the watering can onto the window
